DOC.brief_title: The Tolerability Alprostadil Liposome Injection Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Conducted Chinese healthy adult volunteer , study aim observe safety tolerability single/multiple-dose administration different dos Alprostadil Liposome Injection well confirm safety dose range . 1 . Single dose tolerability test humans.There 7 dose ( 10ug,20ug,50ug,100ug,200ug,300ug,400ug ) group single dose tolerance test healthy adult volunteers.The begin dose study 10ug , accord dose escalation method , subject successfully complete previous dose group pass safety assessment enter test next dose group method . 2 . Multiple dose tolerability test humans.Choose proper dosage multiple dose tolerance test base single-dose tolerance test result .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer least 20 year age old 40 . BMI least 19.0kg/m2 , 24.0kg/m2 . ( The weight great equal 50kg . ) Subjects overweight underweight inclusion . Subjects normal heart rate ( 60100 beat per minute ) well normal blood pressure ( systolic blood pressure:90120 mmHg ; diastolic blood pressure:6090 mmHg ) . Subjects normal medical history , vital sign , physical examination clinical examination ( routine blood , routine urine , blood chemistry , coagulation function ECG , Xray , intraocular pressure ) . A negative hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C , HIV syphilis test result . Subjects ability communicate investigators.Besides , subject must willing remain study center require per protocal complete visit assessment . Given sign write informed consent participate . Subjects brain dysfunction , mental development disorder speech disorder unable communicate investigator . Subjects history psychiatric disease drug dependence past 2 year . Subjects medical history cardiac , liver , renal , digestive system neurological . Subjects family history diabetes , history pancreatitis , cholelithiasis asthma . Subjects significantly abuse alcohol tobacco . Drink 24 hour postdosing study drug . Subjects take medication within 2 week . Subjects suffer exsanguine donate blood 200ml exclude . Subjects participate clinical trial within 3 month exclude . History hypersensitivity allergy study drug drug similar chemical class . Subjects history fainting . Subjects infect unknown reason . Subjects interstitial pneumonia . Subjects glaucoma intraocular pressure hyperthyroidism . Women mentrual period . Women pregnant lactating .
